website_summaries.verdict: Attractive bags that stay open when you want and fold flat for storage. Multiple carrying options, and holds decent weight. Just remember they aren't washable.
pros: Large shoulder strap with smaller side handles for versatile carrying
Stay open while loading and unloading
Made from polypropylene and recycled cardboard
cons: Some instances of handle/strap failure reported
Not washable, due to partial cardboard construction

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I was able to sort my groceries while I shopped. I also bought the cold storage ones and it fits a gallon of milk and then some in one tote (I added more in the tote than what is in the picture.) I did buy the bundle and had plenty of totes for my large shopping trip. I would like to see how sturdy the fabric is, was thinking it would seem thicker but in due time I'll update the review. The fabric held up very well even the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Janea

customer_reviews.title: I especially like that they stay open to be loaded and won't collapse.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after seeing that the maker had improved on the originals. I have a set of earlier ones, that I like a lot, except the handles are not particularly good. The boxes are of a size that they are easily overloaded beyond the capacity of the handles. These new ones have the handles riveted as well as sewn to the sides- and have 'helper handles' on the folding sides I think they will work better.
customer_reviews.author: passepartout

customer_reviews.title: The handles come apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought these three months ago. In that time the strap handles have completely come apart with normal use. One of the straps actually started turning to dust. I've bought products for years through Amazon and this is the one and only time I have been disappointed, and also the only time I have written a review. It's disappointing to buy these supposedly reusable bags only to have them come apart. I would not recommend that anyone purchase this particular product.
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so when I first took them out of the box and fully opened them, I'm not going to lie, I was disappointed that they weren't as big as I was hoping for. However, after actually using them, I discovered that they can carry SOO MUCH! I was able to put a weeks worth of groceries for a family of 5 in both bags! Plus I love how long the straps are, it happened to be raining that day and the long straps made it so much easier to slip on my shoulders to avoid them getting wet! I just love them so much plus I got compliments on nearly each section I was in at the grocery store!
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: These are a little smaller than I first expected but they fit a lot. They are very study and then fold down flat when in storage in my car. I love that the straps are a little longer so they make them easier to carry. I wish they sold them in 3's, I feel like I could use just 1 more to get a good grocery trip in. But I will probably end up ordering another 2. Still, they are super handy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AlainaC

customer_reviews.title: A Must, Must Have.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd set of these. They are perfect!!! They collapse taking up very little space. They are nicely made and pretty heavy duty. They have two different ways to hold them making it a snap for light or heavy items. They fit in a grocery basket great so it makes sorting your items a little nicer. Run them through check out and then just put them right back in the same order. I am a penny pincher and I believe these are worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C. Hardeman

customer_reviews.title: Forget collapsible reusable bags when you can have BOXES with handles is the only way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so for convenience and the benefits of going Green I bought reusable shopping bags. That works out pretty good. And then I ran across these reusable shopping boxes! They worked out so well that I had to buy another set!! Now my reusable shopping bags are taking a backseat to these reusable shopping boxes! I bought this particular one because of the quality of my Earthwise reusable shopping bags and definitely because they have handles on the sides! The handles are definitely a must as this feature makes loading full and sometimes heavy boxes into my car a breeze!! Now my wife won't use anything else when shopping at COSTO or Whole Foods or Sprouts!
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Great and Sturdy Bags that Can hold 2.5 Gallon Tank!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied!!! Which compelled me write a review. The bags are strong enough to hold a 2.5 Gallon Tank!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Tavera

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. So cute, so practical. They fit way more than I expected they would, so I save like 5 plastic bags each. And the clerks at Walmart always thank me for it being a structured bag because they say it's harder to pack the bags that aren't structured. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and totally worth the money! If I couldn't get everything I typically buy in 3 bags I'd get more. Held 2 gallons milk, applesauce, and a bunch more groceries in 1 bag.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: One use only, broken handle
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get these and they looked great when I received them. However, the first time I used them, the handle strap broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Denham

customer_reviews.title: Cute! but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I would really love to give these bags 5 Stars! not only are they extra adorable but they hold a decent amount of product which makes my shopping trips a lot easier than before. My only issue is I haven't had these bags for more than 1 months and one bag already has a hole in the bottom I don't use them that often but when I do I never overload them and to see that hole in the bottom of that bag was very disappointing😔
customer_reviews.author: Missi S

customer_reviews.title: Your bagger will thank you
customer_reviews.text: A durable reusable bag that stands up and open on its own. It transitions easily between flat and open. Unfolded, it has a hard bottom and sides, making it stand open like a milk crate and super easy to fill. It has both straps (light loads) and side handles (heavy loads) giving you two convenient carry options. And finally, it folds flat making it easy to store in your car and cart. Just be aware that because of the solid pieces you wont be able to wad it up the way you would a cloth bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Schutz

customer_reviews.title: These are great.
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for almost a year and I purposely waited that long to see how they held up. I use them everytime I go to the grocery store, sometimes twice a week. And they are also useful in transporting food I've cooked for a potluck or picnic. That reinforced bottom is the best part, as well as the long shoulder straps and the short handles on the ends. I can pack a lot in them and trust they aren't going to snap. They are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy bags
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy bag with the ability to hold a good amount of groceries. I get about a week's worth for two of groceries at a time and this can hold about a quarter of them. Folds and stores easily. I would like to add an edit that i have been using these for several weeks now and they are still going strong. they haven't ripped, torn, or broken anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mirielle S.

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed in the bags. I only used one time, and was careful of the amount I put it the bags. I wanted to “test” them out. One of the bags had the handle rip out off the base. I also had one that was missing two of the inside metal grommets before I even used it. Back to finding the perfect grocery bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Patrick

customer_reviews.title: These bags are excellent for grocery shopping
customer_reviews.text: These bags are excellent for grocery shopping. They look larger online, and I was slightly disappointed at first, but then I realized that they are so sturdy and hold so much that if they were any larger they would be too heavy to carry. I like how they fold up and store easily. The colors are great, and I like that there are two options for the handles. They stack nicely too for putting in your car. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Sunday

customer_reviews.title: Broken Strap on First Use
customer_reviews.text: Strap broke upon first use. Dropped my groceries all over the ground. I would not recommend at all
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size shopping bags
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size shopping bags! Nice and sturdy and they fold up nicely. All three fit in the back of my Jeep Renegade. I was skeptical about the size at first as I am used to using the Aldi's bags that are a bit bigger. I actually like the size of these ones better because it makes them easier to carry full grocery bags through my door. I love that the sides stay up while I'm loading groceries in them. The smaller size allows them to not get as heavy. I do wish that they had some sort of plastic lining to make it easier to wipe out, but it's a small downfall.
customer_reviews.author: ldmarie04

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are EVERYTHING. They are a must-have for any intense grocery shopper. We shop once every 2 weeks and use these primarily at Aldi. These 3 bags, paired with the Rachel Ray cooler bag (matching colors, of course) are everything we need for the trip. They fit perfectly in the cart and are collapsible but really sturdy. The handles on the side mean you can arrange them or haul them in addition to using the main handle. 100% worth a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke on 1st use!
customer_reviews.text: I really do like these bags a lot. They are shallower height wise than I was expecting, but they can still hold quite a bit. It is easy to pack your items inside and easy to carry. You can even stack them one on top of each other in your grocery cart. BUT.... the side handle ripped on the very 1st use!! It was not overfilled, but I did have some heavier items in it (canned items). Pretty disappointing!! So just pay attention to how heavy it is as the handles don't seem to be particularly durable. Still like them tho & I think I can get a few more uses out of the bag before the handle breaks completely!!
customer_reviews.author: Ciara P.

customer_reviews.title: cloth straps disintegrate after a few months
customer_reviews.text: The cloth straps disintegrate after a few months. They worked well until then but I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: red barron

customer_reviews.title: I like their size and usefulness
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to using these. I like their size and usefulness. Sadly, one of them tore through the second time I sued and it was nowhere near 5 lbs. It is now past the return deadline.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Valadez

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Big!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for larger items. They are too wide to fit in the smaller cart but great in a regular sized grocery cart. Handles are strong and they will hold a lot of weight. They are also great for transporting large casserole dishes!
customer_reviews.author: Slimwiddie

customer_reviews.title: They don’t last.
customer_reviews.text: These bags seemed wonderful and sturdy upon first purchase. Unfortunately a mere 3 months out, the flimsy bottoms are disintegrating as shown in these photos. In fairness, the bag does come with a very sturdy secondary bottom flap that flips down, but there is nothing to hold the flap in place once the bottom of the bag tears. These tears were not caused by heavy items in the bags-we leave the bags in our truck between shopping trips and believe the heat/sun may have caused the deterioration.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M.

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I have accumulated several kinds of reusable shopping bags over the last few years. Some were way too large and others were too flimsy. These Earthwise collapsible bags are just the right size for my needs. I purchased two sets and will keep them in my car for my trips to the grocery store. The top handles are long enough for carrying on my shoulder. Having the side handles on the bags will certainly help with loading and unloading them from the car. I also think the bags are cute!
customer_reviews.author: Church Lady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. Sturdy, collapsible. Fits my needs for bags to use at Grocery stores. Remember to pull down the hard bottom when opening the bag. The grocery store cart at my Kroger can hold three of these. I put each packed bag onto the grocery store conveyor belt so the items can be rung up and placed back into the bag. I leave sodas or tea gallons out of my bags, and just carry by handle for transport. The bag could carry them, but I ran out of bags and am too cheap to buy more bags.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: WTH a huge hole in the bottom of this...poor quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the pair was great, but the other had a huge hole in the lining! There’s some sort of hard plastic or wax-like substance sort of ironed into the lining and a huge hole in it... I’m wondering if the set I got was a return?
customer_reviews.author: xo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great to use
customer_reviews.text: My driveway is very steep. Opening the back hatch of my Durango is an adventure every time I go grocery shopping. I've had to run after too many cans and have broken bottles. Its not fun! I purchased a set of these and they are AWESOME! They are sturdy enough to put groceries in and carry them inside, which cuts down on trips to/from the car/house. They also create a great "grocery dam" to hold back the other bags of groceries I set behind them.
customer_reviews.author: K Stuhlman

customer_reviews.title: pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: these feel very well made...i've loaded then with all canned goods (about 20lbs) and they felt like they could handle more...the handles on the side are a really nice touch for unloading from the car...3 of them fit in the bottom of an Aldi's cart when opened. while i don't see them breaking anytime soon, i can't help but feel that for the price that the handles and rivets could be a 'touch' heavier duty..hence minus 1 star will update ..for better or worse...but as of now, i wont go grocery shopping without them, they keep everything nice and secure, instead of tumbling, spilling stuff, and ripping bags
customer_reviews.author: William M. berger

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that anything is wrong with these bags exactly, but they are much smaller than I was expecting. My fault, really, but I don't estimate size very well from dimensions. The photo of these bags is misleading: they are quite small and even with two of them we won't have enough space for all our farmer's market purchases. Saying that, they seem to be made alright, and the design is masculine enough that my husband doesn't feel funny carrying them (if they were pink or flowery they'd look like a purse).
customer_reviews.author: Cyd

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I've had these a few months now as they are mandatory where I live. I feel they make the whole shopping process easier and wayyy more convenient. No more stuffing everything in bags trying to make things fit. More surface area in a square box than a bag. They fit a good number of products and if it gets a bit heavy, you have the option of the shoulder strap. Instead of lugging 10 plastic bags down you forearms, 2 of these will handle a basic grocery trip. Unpack, fold flat & back in the car until next trip. I've had other customers ask me where I purchased them. They loved the look & idea.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for the first time yesterday so if anything changes I will be sure to update. Wow, I’m truly in love with these! I’ve been carrying bags from ikea for our purchases to avoid plastic bags, but these are a game changer. Perfect size, easy to open, easy to carry and hold quite a bit! They are so much easier to use than traditional reusable bags and I think I will get another set to put in my husbands vehicle in case he needs to buy groceries etc. I think they would also be perfect for camping, beach/lake days, or keeping emergency items in your trunk. So versatile!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Kennah

customer_reviews.title: I like these type of Grocery bags/Boxes
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked these type of boxes for groceries. Plus it has "side handles" to boot. They're great, put groceries on just about every surface and they stay held-up without falling over. Unlike regular plastic grocery bags or the reusable bags that grocery stores sell. I get a lot of feedback from clerks saying, they like packing groceries into them too. For the same reason of, groceries not falling over while packing.
customer_reviews.author: Integrity

customer_reviews.title: Can I give 100 stars?
customer_reviews.text: I just used these for the first time, and I have stopped in my tracks to write this review. I have chronic back pain, and carrying grocery bags or tote bags is a killer. I buy a lot of items off Amazon, and I think this is the very best, number 1 thing I’ve ever gotten. Because you can use the side handles, you carry the weight up higher by your waist. Emptying the car out was effortless. I have NO pain, even though today is a bad day for me. I will be getting these for other family and friends. I forgot to pull down the part that stiffens the bottom, and they still worked perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Diane Roche Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Costco or Sam’s shopping
customer_reviews.text: We just joined Costco and love it. However, the hauling each item back and forth was always a pain. I decided to look into some options and ordered these. I used them for the first time and WOW! so much easier! They were durable, fit everything we needed, and were a breeze to setup and tear down. I would also like to add that all 3 bags fit in the large Costco buggy perfectly. Anyone looking for an option to help you with carrying large loads from a large warehouse type shopping, this is your answer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth James

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: The local stores used to carry this style of rigid collapsible bag and for some reason locally they no longer do so I was required to buy them via Amazon. Think of these as more folding self-standing box than any bag, For me this is just what the pediatrician prescribed! Not only do these bags prevent "garage surprises" (breakthrough) they are just enormously handy.around the house. The only glitch may be that the dimensions are just a bit big on occasions for some self-checkout scales. When that happens to me I load my groceries in the plastic bags but then place the bags in these for safety and convenience. .
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These work great!!! I wish they came in other colors, though. But that's not that big of a deal. I bought them for their large size and their good reviews on how sturdy they are... and they really are. I leave them in my car for putting grocery bags in them. That makes for easy unloading process, less trips back and forth from the car. I also have the other one filled with my kids stuff... diapers, wipes, extra shoes, etc. They help keep my car organized. I'd recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Like Sunday Morning
customer_reviews.text: Solid product and SUPER cute in the floral prints. I purchased another brand (Planet E) a while back and also loved those but frankly they were a little boring in color. When I decided I wanted something a little more “fun” I decided on these and am not disappointed. Cashiers and baggers LOVE how easy it is to pack these and let me tell you, they are a game changer. I like self check-out better and I just open a couple up in my cart and pack my purchase before getting on my way. Easy like Sunday morning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional & Useful
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy, good looking gems. They fold up well. I use them to pick up packages and carry office supplies as my job requires me to be mobile. I’ve had many comments asking where I got them, and one of my coworkers asks to borrow it when I’m in the office. I also use them to transport grocery bags so I can reduce trips. They’re wonderful. One of those purchases you just love and don’t know how you lived without it.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE O.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bags
customer_reviews.text: The best part of these is that they are made of a heavy duty materials. They stand perfectly straight when loading groceries. There are two sets of handles that are handy and two different lengths. I get many inquiries of where I got them while in the grocery store checkout. Even the baggers love them because they are so easy to fill up. They hold so much more than paper bags and are very stable. You can fit three of them side by side in a standard grocery cart and if they aren’t too full, you can stack more on top of them. They easily fold down and don’t take up much space in the back of my car.
customer_reviews.author: PollyW

customer_reviews.title: HANDLE BROKE AT FIRST USE
customer_reviews.text: They look nice & are a great size but the fabric handle ripped the very first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags, but bottom not reinforced
customer_reviews.text: Bags look sturdy and are a nice color, but the bottoms are definitely not reinforced as described. Too much hassle to return, so I’ll be keeping them. But it is unfortunate because the rest of the bag looks quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: AKN

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Alot smaller than I expected... also made with cheaper materials than I would have thought.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea... Just too heavy for me.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way they stay open for the bag boy to fill...BUT..... they add way too much weight. Maybe for younger folks They are well made and look like they would last forever. I went back to my Mother Earth cloth bags
customer_reviews.author: Lady SGT (retired)

customer_reviews.title: Pretty AND strong container with multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product. I actually use these boxes for storage of craft items, my Fire, and similar items that I may want close by while watching TV. One container holds my yarn and crochet pattern and supplies for whatever afghan is being made. This sturdy container with more than one type of handle makes carrying my projects with me from room to room or in the car on a road trip easy to handle -- it is unlikely I will drop one of these because of the ease in handling and the strength of the product. Thanks for this pink, feminine box that does everything (and more) that I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia7640

customer_reviews.title: Very durable bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are very good bags if you want to minimize the amount of trips you take from your car to the house after grocery shopping. I have loaded them up pretty good, and they can hold everything. They were rather pricey, which is my only complaint. It took a month to receive them, but I knew that when I ordered them. I am a Shipt shopper, so they are getting a lot of use!
customer_reviews.author: M. Harless

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had purchased these bags and really liked them, so I wanted to try them. They are holding up well so far, but I've only used them 4-5 times. Two fit into the bottom of a grocery cart, and then the third can go crosswise on top of the other two. I can usually carry them over my shoulder unless they are filled with too many heavy items, like milk cartons. But the shorter straps on the end make it easier to pick them up if they're extra heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Cherri T

customer_reviews.title: Love my Earthwise Deluxe Collapsible Reusable Shopping Box
customer_reviews.text: Love this shopping box. Holds a lot of grocery items and i have carried easily as much as 25 lbs.. The long straps to carry on my shoulder and the end handles make it easy to pick up/carry. They open without effort and fold up flat. These are NOT machine washable. For that reason I do use the clear bags offered in the meat dept. to keep any potential meat liquid dripping into box. Overall I am very happy I bought them and have now purchased a second set to use with our truck/5th wheel RV as a we travel. There are so many things I can use these for.
customer_reviews.author: gin

customer_reviews.title: So much better than bags
customer_reviews.text: This might be the best twenty-some dollar purchase I’ve ever made. Groceries no longer go rolling around in my trunk - yay. I don’t have to gather up 20+ flimsy bags with 1-2 items each when I get home - yay. I don’t have to worry about recycling (or feel guilty about trashing) said bags - yay. I can usually fit all my groceries in just three sturdy boxes; the two kinds of handles make moving and carrying these easy; and they’re great for toting other things too (I took meals, flowers and fountain soft drinks to friends in the hospital with ease using one of these boxes). Yay, yay and yay. In short: I heart them.
customer_reviews.author: S LaCore

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Really large and sturdy but straps are not long enough. More for storing things than carrying a full load for most people after shopping. The bag can get really heavy. I'm using on shelf for organization and works great. or use for items in truck to keep in one place and excessible.
customer_reviews.author: Mochamom

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but...
customer_reviews.text: I do like these shopping bags. I really do. They are easy to open, stay open while you pack them, and are easy to carry in the house, but...they are really heavy and add weight to the groceries you are carrying. You can only grab 1 in each hand, compared to being able to grab 2-3 of those collapsible bags, and they really mess with the self check out scale at the store because of that additional weight. I do use them. I do like them. But if you are carrying groceries up a flight of stairs, I would recommend you make another purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for club shopping!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two sets of these and will order more for family and friends. They are well made and make shopping so much easier. I often shop at Costco and these are great to hold all of the items. It's really nice when I get home and I can easily carry in all of the items in either one or two of the bags. I've had many people ask me where I bought them and I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Gulfwinds67

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of these about 10 days ago - after one trip to the grocery store had to order another set because THESE ARE GREAT!! I got the extra set to place in my shopping cart to separate my items in cold, pantry, frozen etc. and then when I get to the checkout I hand my empty set to the cashier and she just transfers from one set to other while checking out, leaving my items sorted the way I like. These are incredible! so easy to carry even with cartons of milk and canned items - I'm only 5 ft tall and barely 100 lbs so these make it very easy to carry my items.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome totes! They hold a lot of things in them, even heavy items, without buckling or folding in on themselves. They are also the perfect length you can put the straps on your shoulder or on your arm depending on the weight of the bag and it fits well. I originally bought the for groceries which they work splendidly for (way better than regular totes for sure) and I like them so much that now we use them for all kinds of things; going to the beach, going to the park, packing some items for a road trip, honestly anything. They are much sturdier than I was even expecting from a tote and would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Shoppers and delivery people, this is the bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed when I unboxed these! They are so sturdy and well made for the price ($10 each). I am a shopper professionally and I go through bags every month. These are made so much better than I expected! And the red is truly a pretty, deep red. I would love to have more in another color. There is a reinforcement panel that drops into place on the bottom. They are large, but not so big that you over load yourself. I can’t wait to use them! Make some more colors, please! Oh! And the handles are all reinforced with rivets, so they won’t tear with heavy loads.
customer_reviews.author: danna

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but ripped on second use
customer_reviews.text: These bags fold easily and you can fit three into a standard size grocery cart. The side handles are really useful for picking the bags up and out of a grocery cart, but the fabric ripped on the second use. There is a rivet that secures the handle to the container, but it’s a real bummer that the fabric is ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Electrical Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags!
customer_reviews.text: I got these because my cat eats the handles off of the plastic grocery bags. To prevent future exposure to the grocery bags (and to prevent my continued worry and stress), I thought the best thing would be reusable bags. I used these for the first time this past Sunday and got everything carried into the apartment with one trip. All my purchases fit in two of the bags. I'm very pleased and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: proakley

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags and I get compliments on them. The are really sturdy and I have packed them full and never question if they will hold. Love the fact that I no longer have to carry 20 plastic bags as each one of these bags seem to replace about 5-10 plastic bags. The handles could be a little thicker but they do hold up really well as are. I would reccomend these bags to anyone who is sick of all the plastic bags either in their homes or in the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Kane

customer_reviews.title: You need for shopping!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great for using at the grocery store, and even at other times when you. Just need to haul a few things around! My grocery store charges for plastic bags, and my other reusable bags were not looking so good, so I purchased these. They are more like a crate than a bag. Even when loaded with stuff they are easy to move with the handles on the side. They feel very sturdy too. I store them in the back of my vehicle and have used them to keep other purchases from rolling around too. I absolutely love these bags!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, disability friendly. Totally worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these as I am a wheelchair user, so I dont dump all my stuff on the way to the car, or into the house. Th one drag..covid mostplaces won't let me use them. Sometimes I can convince them to just bag my stuff in their bags, and then place it in my own bag. Wasteful but it has to work for now. Most clerks get the situation, and feel really bad, but their hands are tied. Yet they still touch nasty cash..not my clean bags...
customer_reviews.author: Grey K.

customer_reviews.title: Need more
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually getting ready to buy another set I also bought the cooler ones as well and they can keep things cold for about 3 hours highly recommend them to anyone I've had many people come up and ask me where I got these they're extremely sturdy and I'm surprised how much they can hold everyone should own these instead of using stupid plastic bags the create waste they take up very little space in my trunk and fold up
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Made to Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to fit in my Escape so when we purchased groceries and put the flimsy bags of goods into the back of the Escape they would spill out and be flung everywhere. The shopping boxes worked beautifully. I bought 8 and they fit four across, two deep. Grocery pick up, the folks love them! There's still plenty of room for heavy items like jugs of water and cat litter to fit in front of the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great "bag"
customer_reviews.text: These are quite nice. Bigger than those flimsy cloth bags, but not so big that u cant carry when filled. Easy to fold/unfold, they stand great even when empty. Not insulated. They have a small "pull handle" on the short side, and longer "carrying handles" on the long sides. They seem to be well sewn, i can put a gallon of milk in it and pack groceries around that, and it holds up well, buttom stays flat. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeee2002

customer_reviews.title: These have made my life much easier!
customer_reviews.text: These reusable bags are great! They have plenty a room in them and they hold up to a lot of weight. I use them when I go grocery shopping. I put them in the back of my vehicle and do the pick up grocery shopping and they fill everything up in them. I get home my husband takes everything in and in only one trip. This is the second batch of these that I have gotten and we really really love them. I’ve made my life much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient for carrying multiple items
customer_reviews.text: These things have changed my life as a pro shopper. Stacking 10 bags of groceries in 3 of the bags is entirely possible, so much better than trying to hang them on your arms. Walking up to third floor apartments is now not as painful. Long handles seem sturdy enough. Collapsible means they take up little space when not in use. Stiff bottom has held up to multiple 12 packs of soda or gallons of milk. Definitely worth the investment, even if they only last a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these mainly for grocery shopping. I love being able to carry and fill one of these instead of picking up a store basket or pushing around a cart. These are easier and more comfortable to carry. I can even put it over my shoulder if it gets too heavy to carry on my elbow. I also keep one near the back door and fill it with things that need to leave the house like returns or library books. I've only been using them a few weeks, but they seem very sturdy and well made and I'm hoping to get a lot of use out of them. Sure beats plastic grocery bags.
customer_reviews.author: Eve G. Morey Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage
customer_reviews.text: I mainly purchased these for toy storage for my grandkids, it's easy for little ones to grab a bag with their toys and tote it around with them. Tried the bags at the grocery store once, but the bagging people had trouble figuring them out. Though I've noticed more shoppers using this type of bag, so baggers should figure it out soon. Colors make me smile and the handles are sewn securely on the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: I love these totes
customer_reviews.text: I love these totes!! I work as a personal shopper and deliver all over. saves me on trips back and forth to the car. sturdy and holds more weight than you would think!! liked so much I bought a second order!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bags years ago when offered at Walmart as an alternative to plastic. Needless to say they lasted several years and lots of abuse. When I went to replace them I could no longer find them at Walmart so Amazon to the rescue. Every time I shop now someone asks where I got them and how cool they are. I love them and hope they stay in stock as everything that is used all the time they will wear out, I expect several years again though, Peace out and if thinking about this product buy them they are worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had these sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I hated reusable bags because they're such a mess and a pain to carry and to put stuff in. Since buying these (2 sets) it has changed everything. The only bad thing is having to explain to the grocery clerk that the bottom folds down. Even tho I wish they were a little bigger, they fit and easily carry 2 gallons of milk in one. It also works good for carrying an overlock sewing machine. I would probably end up with too much weight if they were bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags
customer_reviews.text: Folds flat to keep in car. They fit A LOT! So nice to have a bag that stands on its own while you fill it. Two handle choices for lifting the bag once filled. Bought another set once I found that I loved these. Didn't want to pay Connecticut ANY more money and especially not for a 10 cent tax on bags. Way to be greedy Connecticut instead of just banning the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase of the Earthwise Reusable Shopping box totes. I am not a fan of plastic bags at checkout. I have steps, the totes make it much easier to carry. I have have several people ask me when I bought them, so I have directed them to your site through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Concept, Not Durable Enough!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Concept! Sturdier than the floppy bags!! 😊Easy to fold! Durability- We have used them 6 times, and fabric pulling out of stitching. Stitches too long, small stitches more durability. Spots where fabric wasn’t caught in stitches! Fabric on bottom corners wearing through already. Like handles on ends!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy V.

customer_reviews.title: Best amazon purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea it was possible to love a reusable grocery bag as much as I love these. And the person who ends up bagging my groceries at the store ends up asking where I got them every time I shop! They fold up compact, are spacious, have a solid hard base that unfolds, and are solid construction. I love when I get home and only have these three bags to carry instead of 30 obnoxious plastic bags that are bag for the environment. This has possibly been my favorite amazon fund to date. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sorting laundry
customer_reviews.text: I wash my family's clothes together so I have to sort between 3 different bedrooms. I've noticed that it's so convenient to unfold these boxes to put my toddler's clothes in and my baby's in another. The benefit of a nice low container is that my 3 year old can take out the folded clothes and put them away herself. The long handles are so convenient for me since I just throw one over my shoulder while my hands are full. When not in use they stay folded up in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Crouthamel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and carry a ton!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate plastic bags, but some of the reusable ones are so flimsy, I decided to look for something a little more heavy duty for shopping trips. I absolutely love these bags. The double-supported bottoms, the two choices of handle, their larger size and durability. Can't say enough about them. I love taking them into Aldi and stuffing them with cheap groceries, and having people ask where I got them. I would highly recommend these for people like me who are trying to save the planet one plastic bag at a time!
customer_reviews.author: NationalParkHopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great and deserve some kind of award. They offer lots of room, long handles, sturdy sides/bottom. Most importantly, they stand up perfectly when you are packing your groceries in them and fold flat for storage. I bought 2 to see if I loved them, then another 4, for a total of 6. Food shopping will never be "fun," but these handy totes certainly make the job much easier. Thanks to Earthwise for making a high quality, functional product that solves an everyday/every week need.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann

customer_reviews.title: These bags are AMAZING! I am trying to go plastic free so ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are AMAZING! I am trying to go plastic free so I also bought the insulated bag set that matches this set. They hold a LOT of items! Love the fact you can fold them back down flat which saves room in the car. Highly recommend them to everyone. Get rid of plastic bags! You don't even need the paper ones now given at health food stores. The cashier at Whole Foods and several of the customers in line asked me where I got them from and I said "from Amazon, of Course!"
customer_reviews.author: vcraig

customer_reviews.title: Carry all
customer_reviews.text: I have used these to haul groceries and to put things in when going on vacation. They would be especially nice for someone that lives on the second floor or higher. You would make fewer trips. I can carry a much heavier load using these. I use mine mainly for groceries. They are a lot better than using a plastic bag. They also have a flat bottom that can be lifted up when storing them.
customer_reviews.author: midwest

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I get these sooner?
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags for grocery shopping. A year ago I purchased the EarthWise insulated bags for my frozen items and was so pleased I purchased these as well. No more groceries spilling in the trunk, bags breaking, carrying in dozens of bags of groceries, collecting countless plastic bags to pollute the earth. You can fit about 3 plastic sacks into one reusable bag. Its easy to carry either by the strap handles or the small loops at either end. I fold them up and place them in the trunk for my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsey

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for everything! I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three sets, three different prints. They are pretty, sturdy and love how they stand on their own and don’t tip over and spill out! I use them for groceries, for hauling stuff to and from the camper, shower supplies at the campground, picnic supplies, overnight bag when I don’t want to load a suitcase, baby supplies, gifts, just about anything and everything! My cat likes to curl up in them too lol.
customer_reviews.author: Loony

customer_reviews.title: Best green idea ever
customer_reviews.text: I love these boxes. After the first set, I bought a second set. Loading the groceries in these boxes is so much easier and convenient than bags.. even the reusable ones. The boxes hold 2 to three times the amount of groceries than bags, leading to fewer trips from the car to the house. The boxes alsomake it much easier to organize the groceries while shopping, and then much easier to put up.
customer_reviews.author: Pamles

customer_reviews.title: Size & sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I had purchased one a couple of years ago from a local food market. They no longer offered them, so I went online searching. When shopping, they hold a large amount of product and save on bags. I am often complimented on my bags by both shoppers and clerks. A great buy, very attractive and convenient ... many patterns online to chose from ... happy shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Doris G.

customer_reviews.title: These Trunk Organizers are Handy
customer_reviews.text: They are great for transporting all those bags we get at the store. Easier to carry into the house. Then we found out they are nice for traveling to the vet and other visits that require a lunch, bows, water bottles, and etc. Very handy, they are rigid! So you can quickly find what you are looking for. It helps to prevent soft foods from being crushed.
customer_reviews.author: LoveDogs

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: These have held up well during the several months I've owned them. Often I fail to remember to take them into the supermarket but they still are helpful in getting the groceries from my truck into the house - - - fewer trips. They will hold almost too much weight. I would buy them again but it appears I won't need to for considerable time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hamp

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things we purchased - makes life easier.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t imagine life without these. Use A couple times weekly for groceries (just keep a few in my car), use often for carrying things to and from work and such. Use inside the house to carry things up and down the stairs, store something temporarily, etc. and they fold and store away easily. We ALWAYS get complements about these at the grocery from other shoppers and baggers too. So much easier to carry two totes in from the car than carrying 10 plastic bags. And better for the environment too. We’ve had our first set over a year and are just now seeing signs of wear at the edges so we bought these for back up.
customer_reviews.author: K. Painter

customer_reviews.title: Love these!! Buy them you won't be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a few months now and I love them. They are strong and hold a lot of items. I've completely gotten rid of the plastic grocery store bags and only use these. They open and close easily. I store them flat in my car. Great for unloading at home as well because you can see everything it's holding and they are easy to carry. I strongly recommend these. I am going to order another set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT TOTES
customer_reviews.text: Once you use a box tote like this, you'll never go back to a floppy grocery tote again. These are sturdy, functional, and colorful. You can see your groceries as you fill the bag, effectively stacking items in the totes. Being a tote, you can safely put your breads in them, on top of other items and know the bag isn't going to shuffle around in your car and the bread get crushed anyway. When you are done, simply fold them up for the next use!
customer_reviews.author: CUPCAKE MOMMA

customer_reviews.title: Groceries only take one trip
customer_reviews.text: These bags are much easier to carry in one trip than 50 grocery bags. The sides are sturdy and the reinforced bottom flips up so you can fold the bags neatly when not in use. The mesh/cloth material looks like it'll be easy to wipe down with a damp towel when the bags get grimy-looking. The side handles are a nice addition. Update: The bags did not last a full month. The bottom of one of the bags ripped from the seam after 3-4 uses.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to my bag collection
customer_reviews.text: I several bags like these, the real winning plus these have over my other bags is the linger handles. Makes is much easier to carry them into the store over my shoulder when they are flat and I do occasionally use them when I shop the mall much easier to carry my purchases than the plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: MBK

customer_reviews.title: Many Compliments From Store Clerks
customer_reviews.text: Like many cities, our city recently imposed a ban on plastic bags. These lightweight bags are so convenient to fold and carry. They unfold easily and the bottom floor keeps the bags upright and secure. I like the added side handles, as well. They fit perfectly in the shopping carts and make loading and unloading groceries a breeze. I get compliments about these from shopping clerks and other shoppers all the time. I’m well organized and the bags fit nicely in my car trunk. I hope they last awhile!
customer_reviews.author: VAB

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely buy more of these. They are so convenient and easy to store. Not to mention they fit what 2-3 plastic bags can hold. It is a real grocery game changer. I will be getting some more for my grandmother to use so she can go shopping more easily since these bags hold more that means less trips back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlamps

customer_reviews.title: 2 years + and still like new
customer_reviews.text: Bought these over 2 years ago and I use them all the time. I have hauled in multiple 8 packs of pop and the handles don't flinch. You can't go wrong with these. I also use them to take things for potluck night, overnights, you name it I use them because they are always in the car waiting for me to load them up. They are just handy when you go store to store and you don't want things rolling around.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR MY NEEDS
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grocery trips. 2nd time I bought these. Love the 1st 3 so much that i bought the additional ones. Fit perfect in grocery carts, big or small. Very Sturdy, nice long handles to carry into house, which make it easier to do so....So easy to fold and open. Hard bottom and sides which add to the best sturdiness. Absolutely Reccomend!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle65

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They fold flat and are easy to store. They are solid and durable when opened up. If you have a heavier load of groceries, probably use the small handles on the sides to get a better grip and not put too much strain on the straps. Over all we love these and they are the only bags we use on shopping trips. Much better than the regular reusable shopping bags the grocery stores sell!
customer_reviews.author: Detronyx

customer_reviews.title: These were a great investment!
customer_reviews.text: Our local supermarket started a new "scan as you go" service, which we love utilizing. We can open these bags in the cart (it is a tight fit, but all 3 DO fit) and bag our stuff as we scan it. We love these, and expect them to last for a long time. Note: they had a strange smell when first opened. I let them air out for a while, and now they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this!! It's beautiful and sturdy. I've had this for at least 6 months and still no signs of wear and tear. It's collapsable, and there's a flap that folds down to the bottom for support. I can pack about 15 lbs worth of goodies and still feel confident it won't fall apart. Of course, I don't do that all the time, but I do carry cans and heavy items often. I also get so many compliments on them whenever I go out. I live in NJ, so we're not used to using reusable bags. But I hope I'm doing my small part in reusing.
customer_reviews.author: January5th

customer_reviews.title: So useful!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these bags! They are so handy for grocery shopping, transporting covered dishes, or anything you don’t want to spill or slide around in your car. So versatile in uses. They are sturdy, and have a fold up liner in the bottom for extra support. They fold easily. The only complaint I have is the odd, smelly odor they have. I’ve tried a few things to remedy it, but I can still faintly smell it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: definitely recommend Holds a lot of weight
customer_reviews.text: These are so great I got another set not only fun and colorful but I know I have had at a minimum 13-14 pounds in there if not more and the handles have not ripped the bottom does not give out. I have had these for over nine months now and they are the only grocery bags are use as we are charge for grocery sacks here in Washington state definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Earthwise Deluxe Collapsible Reusable Shopping Box Grocery Bag Set with Reinforced Bottom Storage Boxes Bins Cubes (Set of 3) (Green/Turq/Purple)
feature_bullets: DURABLE: Made of heavy duty, 80 gram Non-Woven Polypropylene and recycled cardboard walls giving these bags a rigid structure when opened. Shoppers and checkers alike love these bags becuase they stay open and upright when loading.
LARGE CAPACITY: Bag Size: 10”H x 14.5”W x 10”D. Volume is 4 US Gallons

CONVENIENT: Folds up flat for easy storage with foldable reinforced bottom for extra durability. Rigid bottom keeps the bags flat and sturdy in your trunk so nothing will slide around in your car. Stays open and upright for easy loading.
MULTI-USE: Ideal for groceries, general shopping, going to the beach, picnics, boating, concert events, laundry, storage and more.
EASY TO CARRY: Our box bags have short side handles in addition to the shoulder straps making it easier to carry a heavy load.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars4,404 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
